With that context, your mention of the Microsoft Azure meetup is a great segue to discuss how Azure's AI and machine learning capabilities can be applied to your project.

Reaching out to the founder of the sustainable fashion startup is still a great idea, and now you have a fresh perspective on how Azure's technology can enhance your project. You can mention how the meetup inspired you to explore ways to leverage Azure's AI and machine learning capabilities to drive positive change in the sustainable fashion industry.

When reaching out, you could say something like:

"Hi [Founder's Name], it was great meeting you at the mixer! I've been thinking a lot about our conversation and how my project, [Project Name], could potentially align with your sustainable fashion startup. I recently attended a Microsoft Azure meetup and learned about the latest developments in cloud computing, which got me thinking about how Azure's AI and machine learning capabilities could be used to drive positive change in our industry. I'd love to discuss how we could collaborate to bring more transparency and sustainability to fashion consumers. Would you be open to a call to explore potential collaboration opportunities?"

By sharing your experience at the Azure meetup, you're showing that you're proactive, interested in innovative solutions, and willing to explore new technologies to drive positive change. This can help establish a common ground with the founder and create a more engaging conversation.
